website_summaries.verdict: An elegant, no-frills case with a nice feel.
pros: Silky liquid silicone shell with inner microfiber lining and convenient built-in magnetic plate
Raised lips for screen and camera protection

customer_reviews.title: Be advised: it doesn’t cover the bottom edge of the phone AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. It’s not “rubber” as in sticky... it’s velvety smooth and slides in and out of of your pocket easily. Fits good with a screen protector on. Be advised: it doesn’t cover the bottom edge of the phone AT ALL so if it drops that edge of your screen is not protected. I didn’t realize this or I would have bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: J & K Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this case. It's good quality and beautiful in color. I dropped my phone quite a bit this past year (just small drops onto the floor or ground) and this case protected my phone each time. There was absolutely no damage to my device but unfortunately, that meant that the case was the one that took a beating. So it didn't last me one year but as you can see, that was my fault. I already bought a replacement case from the store (more out of immediate need) but if i had the time, I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Silicone part of case can break and peel very easily
customer_reviews.text: Update: The quality of the case remains the same, but the customer service was fantastic! They bent over backwards to make sure that I was happy and satisfied. We will give them a try and order another case. This case was very poorly made in my opinion because within the first few weeks of having it, the silicone started chipping around the corners and camera. If you are looking for a sturdy case, Don’t Go With This Case!! Also it is quite hard to clean as everything sticks to it like shirt fabric and fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: curious

customer_reviews.title: Cracking
customer_reviews.text: Updated review!: customer service from the company reached out to me and offer to send me a new case free of charge in any color I wanted and even recommended a different case they make just Incase I wanted something different. Excellent customer service and will definitely buy more products from them for this reason! Original: I really like this case and it cleans really easy. It also protects my phone but I’ve only had this phone case for about 2-2 1/2 weeks and it’s already starting to crack on the bottom. Not sure if I will purchase this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone case, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. I've purchased about five of these cases for various model iPhones over the last few years. The quality is excellent and I constantly receive compliments (to the degree that my friends have bought this same case!). The case is also very affordable at this price point, so I've purchased it in a few different colors. The most recent case I ordered actually cracked near the base of the phone. I contacted customer service and they immediately shipped a replacement, at no cost. AMAZING customer service! I will definitely continue to be a repeat customer and order another one of these cases in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Received a replacement cover from Torras team. Team cares about customer. They go extra miles to make sure that customer interest is well taken care. What I like the most is that team acknowledged my complain, acted quickly to replace the cover. Kept me well informed about me replacement cover delivery and at the end they gave me choice if I want any other product line what they have in market. I truly appreciate Torras team customer centric approach. I rate them 4, as they deserve. Last but not the least is the new cover looks good
customer_reviews.author: BipinKumar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blue Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to see the baby blue color as shown and good quality of this cover. I was a little hesitant about a few reviews stating the corners cracked, but I have had other silicone covers without an issue so am giving this one a try. I only have it for a month or so, but very happy with it. Would give it a 5 star if I had it for a longer period of time. Don't anticipate any problems. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this case but I've only had it for about ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Immediately after seeing my review the company emailed me and offered to send a free, new case. I was extremely impressed with their customer service!!! I love this case but I've only had it for about a month and the bottom corners have started to split. Pretty disappointing, especially for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this case - will not last long
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for one month and I'm super easy on my phone. Spends most of the time in my purse or at home so very little wear and tear. Thought this was a nice case. Reasonably priced and fun color but now has developed small tears on the front at both left and right corners. Have never had this happen with a case. Had to order a new case. This time went with a well known brand!
customer_reviews.author: ABB

customer_reviews.title: Please Make More Colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case about a week and am extremely pleased -- does not scratch easily, fits perfectly, and seems durable. Lining is particularly nice for protecting the phone. Also love that the bottom allows for easy access to charge and use headphones. Only thing I would change is a wider color selection -- a mid-tone grey or gold shade would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for magnetic mounting
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great case. I love that it's thin so the phone still fits easily in my pocket and that it attaches solidly to the magnetic mount in my car. It's smooth but has a bit of grippiness to it so that it doesn't slide out of your hands too easily. I wish it was a bit grippier, but it's better than the hard plastic case I had. It seems too thin to be very protective, but I have dropped the phone once or twice with no harm.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very grippy, you won't drop it, but it will turn your jean pocket inside-out.
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice quality and feel. I haven't experience any peeling like some of these others, but I imagine it could when it gets cut or scrapped. Only problem I have is that it is sooo rubbery and grippy it pulls my pocket inside-out every time I take it out. This would be fantastic for a woman in a purse, but for a guy who wears jeans, this is just annoying. The Quality / Feel / Fit-and-Finish are great, so I'll leave it at 4 stars, but I will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for those who love apple silicon cases !
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous phone cases for many years. I treat them dresses for my phone. I fell in love with the apple silicon cases and have been basically going back to them, they just feel so good in the palm of my hand. These are cheaper and are basically an exact dupe of those $35 cases. I don’t expect it to last a long time since I get about 6 months or so wear on my apple cases before they start tearing/ ripping on the corners. And yes, my silicon cases comes from the apple store at the mall so they are not knock offs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: VERY cute case that has a nice feel. Still allows you to enjoy the slim ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY cute case that has a nice feel. Still allows you to enjoy the slim design of the iPhone. Biggest pet peeve of other cases. Non-slip feel. Hopefully will hold up with daily use. It has a curved design that slips over the phone and protects your screen from touching the table if you place it face down that I wasn't expecting. If it holds up (unlike some other reviews) I would order another one.
customer_reviews.author: gt26

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I could do zero stars. This case lasted only 3 days before part of it cracked and fell off. I wasn’t expecting a shock absorbent uber protective case for what I paid. But without ever even dropping it and just shoving it in my pockets and purse it cracked. Horrible. And the silicone is falling off part of it. I hope I didn’t wait too long to be able to return it, if I did I’m out $18. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Protective Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. The color is exactly as shown. I have dropped my phone several times and this case has protected my phone from any scratches or damage. The case fits snugly and was easy to put on my phone. The buttons line up perfectly and easy access to use the charger. You will not be disappointed in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of this case. My wife wanted one so I bought her one. But her’s is cracked on both right and left sides for the bottom portion. After only a couple of weeks. Still likes the case but we question the durability. 4/18/18 update The shipper responded to my comment and offered to send me a replacement. After a bit of email tag, I just ordered a replacement. I let them know this and they immediately sent me a refund for the replacement. You don’t hear of this level of customer service anymore. Refreshing. And the case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Uchida

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and smooth functionality ---I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the case and it is superb as far as fit. The openings for the camera eye, logo, and mute buttons are precisely cut. Where there are no holes ---volume controls and the on-off button, the case is nicely contoured for ease of operation, even though the buttons are not visible. I couldn't be more pleased with the product. It is both elegant (love the soft velvety feel) and protective. It replaces a heavier and thicker case with a cover flap for the face of the phone. The older case did not allow me to seat the phone onto the phone holder in the car so that I could use maps.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, one minor drawback
customer_reviews.text: Good case. It’s slim, but still protective. I’ve had it for about a year, dropped my phone several times, it did a good job of protecting it. The last drop caused an edge to bend and later the coating peeled off, but the phone was ok. The only thing I didn’t like is that lint from clothes sticks to the matted surface, I slide my phone in and out of my jeans back pocket a lot, so it’s a little annoying every time it gets covered with blue lint. But overall, I’ve been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TB Ruseva

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case!! My husband just got his first iPhone, he wasn't too happy because he said it felt like glass and he was afraid to carry. I purchased this case and slipped his phone into it, didn't tell him, He was SO happy when he picked up his phone and it was in this sturdy case, not big and awkward to hold, I also purchased the screen glass protector and now he can carry his phone to work and use it! Great Case!! Fits perfectly for iPhone 6s and the dark blue is a great color for my husband. Thanks amazon as always, GREAT products!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for a while now, and I do still really like it. 5/5 stars. I've dropped my phone a few times (as you can see by the mild tears and scratches around the edges), and it's stayed protected. One day I oddly noticed this weird smudge right in the middle of the back of the case, and I couldn't get it out so I tried just putting a sticker on top to distract from it. But on the plus side, it's super soft and light and thin and just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a day but already really like it. Super soft, the pink color goes great with the Rose gold phone. UPDATE: I had broken this case quickly a couple so I tried a new case thinking that this one broke too easily. I HATED that new case and how it felt in my hand. So then I thought, maybe I don’t need a case. WRONG. Turns out I drop my phone a lot and now instead of breaking my case, I broke my screen (fortunately only at the edges). So guess what, I’m back to this case. I’m a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: I had a light blue one this April and loved it very much
customer_reviews.text: I had a light blue one this April and loved it very much! The color was exactly what I want and elegant. The hidden magnet (you would not notice it exists as the case is not heavy until you mount it to a magnetic phone stand) works like a magic. The texture prevents easy slips from any surface and feels great. However, what amazed me was the customer service of the seller. The case started to peel off around the bottom corner and luckily it comes with a 180-day warranty ( can you imagine this? Awesome!) so I contacted the seller and they mailed a replacement right away! Now I ordered a new yellow one just for a change!
customer_reviews.author: CindyLee

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it...time will tell...
customer_reviews.text: This periwinkle color (light blue) is beautiful and I'm hoping that I received one that will not fall apart as many reviewer's experiences. Although the company quickly replaces it if it does, makes me wonder why these reviewers have not given another update on the new case as to how holding up? Time will tell! Again, color is a gorgeous periwinkle and it's slim and comfy on the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Molliesusu

customer_reviews.title: It’s too tight and splits apart after just three days!
customer_reviews.text: This case is way too tight. It kept slipping back off the corners for the first day or so. Now, it’s splitting apart! Three days on my phone and it’s splitting. Very disappointed in this case as it was a medium priced case. But, it’s way too tight for my phone. I am very easy on my phone. The case is in mint condition other than it splitting apart from being ill fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the case...the only issue is I bought it to use the magnetic feature and the cases silicone coating causes the case to slide off of magnetic surfaces. **update : received the item 7/6 and it is cracked and breaking on the corner by today, 7/20. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: ashley s

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute color - I got mint green. I would say it looks almost light aqua, but still so pretty. About 9 mo after buying this it started breaking though. A crack and a couple chips of the material came off the edge around the screen. I also hate how the silicone material sticks to my hair and yanks a few strands out when I finish with a call and take it away from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Silicone peels off. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Color and texture were good but within a month, the silicone on the corners started peeling off as if there were air pockets between the silicone and hardball plastic of the case. The peeled off spots just keep getting bigger. Such a disappointment for the price. Update: the seller contacted me and replaced the case free of charge. Rating was updated to 3 stars from 2 to account for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smulligan

customer_reviews.title: Great for price awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: love the color and the price is decent although after using it for a little over a month it already started ripping on the corners. I had no idea there was a 180 day warranty on this product and within hours of me posting my original review they contacted me and offered to send a replacement for free in the color of my choice the color I chose cost more than the one I originally purchased and they did not mind. Amazing customer service!! I will definitely be buying again :)
customer_reviews.author: JeSsica

customer_reviews.title: Sleek but product a little defective
customer_reviews.text: Really cute colour (ordered in lavender) but the bottom corners have some plastic chipping away which I noticed when taking out of the box. It's no biggie, but for the price a little unexpected. Otherwise, super cute phone case. EDIT 11/26/19 Case is sleek, soft, and did a great job of protecting my phone, but eventually after six months, it started to pill. After contacting customer service, they immediately reached out and without any trouble provided me with a new case. I am incredibly impressed ! Thank you, i'm a loyal customer for life and highly recommend to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because I really liked the light periwinkle blue color and that it was a smooth matte case. Well, within a month from purchasing it, the edge already began to tear. I'll admit my nails are a little long and pulling it in and out of my pocket was probably the culprit, but then those tears began ripping off in chunks. And the fact that the case collects any type of fuzz or link it comes into contact with is super annoying and untidy looking. The case was super thin and nice looking, I just wished it would have held up better than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and warranty coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone case with even better company service. Our daughter bought her case on 1/1/19. It was wearing on the corners so I contacted TORRAS for support. I learned the case was covered under warranty and a free replacement was sent right away. Emma was extremely helpful, courteous and quick to respond. I would definitely buy from TORRAS again and would recommend you reach out to them directly if you have any issues with their cases.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable/magnetic is weak
customer_reviews.text: This is the second case that I’ve purchased. The first one was great for a while but it fell apart over time. I decided to give t another chance and I’ve had the second one for 3 weeks and without dropping it or any trauma, there’s already a chunk missing from the bottom. Which is frustrating because once one piece comes off, it starts peeling really bad. Also, the magnet on this one is awful. It barely sticks to my car mount. Lastly, the hole that goes around the ringer thing is broken internally or warped. You can’t tell well in the picture but it doesn’t even sit down flat on that part of my phone. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Harris

customer_reviews.title: Had issues but seller is sending a new case to try again!
customer_reviews.text: I real love the color if this case! It also feels really nice, like a smooth- like silicone over a harder plastic. Unfortunately, the rubber coating chipped off after the first time I dropped it. My cases usually last about a year before they’re damaged and I need a new one. I paid a little more for this one thinking this wound a nice durable and low-profile case. Really a let down. Edit: I am now awaiting a new case. Seller reached out to me regarding these issues stating it’s a rare occurance and has shipped me a new case, free of charge, to try again. Will update once again if case holds up to my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jack and Kate

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I started using this on August 30th. It’s now November 11th and it’s falling apart. The rubber is peeling off the corners. I don’t do anything unusually active or rough with my phone - it just hangs out in my pocket or bag. At first I really liked this - it’s cute and has a nice texture that makes it easy to hold - but not even lasting three months is pretty terrible quality, even for a relatively inexpensive case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I am very particular about my phone cases, but as a college student, have relatively slim pickings. I picked this one because it was cute, but didn’t have terribly high hopes for its sturdiness, and boy was I wrong. This case has been with me through drops down the stairs, falling face-first onto concrete, a puppy anxious to use it as a toy, and everything in between, all without a single scratch to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaija Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Cracked at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Review update: I was contacted by the customer service representative and the experience was incredible. Abby was outstanding. The company takes pride in the quality of the product. I provided a picture of my original case and Abby immediately sent me a new one. According to the customer service representative, the material of the original case is soft and the manufacturer has updated the series. I received my new case and so far I don’t have issues. Original review:The bottom of the case cracked already. I’ve only had this case for two weeks. A little disappointed since I haven’t been dropping the phone to see such fast wear and tear of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: This case is bright, happy and attaches to my car magnetic phone holder without issue. No access ports or speakers are remotely covered, and are easily accessed. It is also easy to clean. It is definitely nonslip. It is no nonslip that it can be difficult to slide into a pocket. :) It has also provided sufficient insulation for accidental drops.
customer_reviews.author: Ada B.

customer_reviews.title: Have always had Otterbox covers. These are much cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Have always had Otterbox covers. These are much cheaper and mre durable as far as saving my glass screen covers, which is important to me. Must be due to the fact that they are made of rubber instead of plastic. Would highly recommend Review update: Corner broke after a year
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Until it broke after 2 weeks - But will get replacement for free!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful case and fits perfectly. Color is as shown. I was really happy with it until it broke the second week! With no apparent reason. I am very careful with my phone and never toss it around cause it already has a cracked scene. I know my phone is as broke as me. But this morning I woke up and noticed the crack on the case. How!!!? It’s not worth the price. Edit: I contacted the company on return policy and they have offered me to send another one as a replacement with no charge. Which is great!! Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my case in June and at first it was an amazing case, until around the first week of August random holes started to pop up around the buttons and towards the bottom of the case. I went on to ignore it until the case split completely in two of the 4 corners, leaving me with a broken case. I loved the case because of its feel and color, it protected my phone nicely. I'm just disappointed it split, I hadn't expected it to do so. I hope it was just a faulty case. I plan on buying another case in red to give it another chance.
customer_reviews.author: AZ home

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up against everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Follow up: after writing this review customer service emailed me and sent a replacement free of charge. But now that replacement has yet again worn down within 3 months of use. The case is just not built for durability. Really disappointing. The phone case is exactly as described. Provides protection while maintaining a sleek appearance, my issue is that two months into everyday use the case has started to split/crack in multiple places. I have contacted customer service in hopes of a replacement. Time will tell if they stand behind their 180-day warranty
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this cover. It has a buttery soft hand feel. Fits my iPhone 6 perfectly. Color is just what I wanted - soft yellow that shows up in my purse easily. I’ve dropped it with no phone damage. I highly recommend this silicone cover and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for me
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have bought a couple of these. I like the feel of these and how thin they are. At the same time they seem durable and actually protect my phone. Had an issue with some of the rubber peeling back on one after the first month, and they are sending me a new one after sending them a picture of it. So great customer service also!
customer_reviews.author: HOKS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: After a couple months using this case, the corners are starting to break (this also happened with the Apple version), and I just purchased a replacement. For the price, it's still a great case and I'm glad I gave it a shot! I will end up buying again. Original Review: I love the color and I'm so pleased with the quality. It's VERY similar to the Apple version, which I loved and protected my phone from a 5 foot drop onto rocks and shells. The real main differences are the big hole to show the Apple logo and it's smoother (doesn't grip like the Apple case).
customer_reviews.author: Cass C

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great case
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't very satisfied with this case due to it being very slippery and no grip, but the seller has taken the issue into matter and they're going to replace it with another case just to satisfy my experience with them. On top of that, I get to keep the old case (which is this one). This company is a true definition of perfect customer satisfaction and experience. They take very well care of their clients and will definitely recommend them for everyone reading this comment. Just because they took care of me and my issues, I give them 5 stars. Theres no better satisfaction then a company that puts their clients first. Thanks TORRAS
customer_reviews.author: Christian Laines

customer_reviews.title: A cute case and it served its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these we have purchased for my daughter. She had the first one for maybe a year, but she’s a teenager and is rough with her phone. After many drops - a few on concrete that I witnessed and who knows how many others I did not see - the case was starting to look scuffed and it was cracked. But the case did its job well and protected the phone. So time for a new case....gonna stick with this one that we know works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevlar

customer_reviews.title: I would like to say this IPhone Case is the best case ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say this IPhone Case is the best case I have ever owned. It came sooner than expected, the color is absolutely BEAUTIFUL. Thank for a Great IPhone Cover...I get complall the time. The case is durable and just as described. Thank you for providing a Superb product
customer_reviews.author: Oxnard

customer_reviews.title: I am a habitual phone breaker and this has kept ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a habitual phone breaker and this has kept my phone safe, since getting this case I have not needed to replace my phone due to physical damage. After several falls, there is no damage on my phone. The case is a little busted up now but it has gone through a lot. I drop my phone off my high rise bed onto hardwood floors at least once a day. I drop it getting out of my car onto blacktop, sidewalks you name it. This case is not bulky and it feels soft, it has a built in magnet that works with basic car (magnetic) mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Esme Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, love the case but is not super durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The feel and how light it is are great - it offers great protection as well. I had two issues (one with case coming off around camera, peeling back, and another with a pinhole on the bottom of it) but their customer service is great and they sent me replacements. If you are looking for some super durable then this is not for you, but lightweight and protects against scratching/nicks, this will work. UPDATE - the third one I have now has a nick in it. I really like this case, just wish it was more durable. The company gets 5 stars for customer service but 4 for the case because of it's lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: I hate this phone case. It falls apart SO easily. I thought it was maybe just the first one I got, but the second one was just as bad!!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Celis

customer_reviews.title: Sleek case + excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light blue TORRAS phone case. The case is slim and lightweight yet provides the right amount of protection. The exterior is soft to the touch and prevents your phone from sliding on smooth surfaces. The customer service is fantastic -- I reached out to the company when the silicone started to crack/peel and they were extremely responsive and replaced the case quickly and cheerfully. It is clear they stand behind the quality of their products and for this reason I will continue to purchase their cases when I upgrade to a new phone in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but silicone rips!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The customer service for this company is awesome and contacted me to let me know that there is a year warranty for the case which I was not aware of. They are sending me a replacement! Original: Okay, I’m on the fence about this product. I love the feel and the look of the case, but it does have some flaws. I’ve only had the case a month and there are already ‘rips’ in the silicone part of the case, where you can see the plastic underneath. All of these occurred without me noticing, it wasn’t from a drop or anything. Anyways, it does look great and seems really protective, but the ripping does bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Slim, but not built to last at all.
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved the case, but it's been less than two months and the corners are already peeling away. Very disappointed as the slim profile of the case is great, but it's not worth much if it starts to deteriorate after a little over a months use. UPDATED - Torras reached out to me upon my one star review and offered excellent customer service. They are sending a new case, hopefully the first one was just defective. Their team contacted me immediately and went above and beyond to remedy the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors; no one else has these colors! Also the case is slim and lightweight so I love that, but it cracked at the corners after just a few weeks. The costumer service was great and happily and painlessly offered to send me a replacement....which hasn’t shown up after like 2 weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *Updated review* Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Piece around the screen lock switch broke during first installation. Poor quality. *Update* Torras contacted me about my issues and issued a refund! *Update 2* Torras sent a replacement case with promised increase in durability. The new case was put on with no issues! Full button functions with a nice snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, until it cracks
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After posting my review, the company reached out to me to offer a product replacement, noting their 180 day warranty on their products. They quickly sent a replacement free of charge. Great customer service! I love this case, its sleek but still protects the phone. The only issue is the same as others have stated, the bottom corners crack. I think I've used this case two weeks in total (not consecutive) and it already has a huge crack on the bottom corner. If it didn't crack it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Nice but started to peel
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice case. I purchased because I wanted a slim case. Unfortunately after only two weeks the silicon has started to peel back from the edges revealing clear plastic case and continues to get worse. My sister has their case for iPhone plus and doesn't have any issues. Not sure if I got a bad case, or maybe has to do with the fact that I keep it in my pocket and pull it in and out all day
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conejo

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Replaced Phone Case!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color and feel.of her TORRAS Love Series iPhone 6S Case! She dropped her phone just shortly after having her new case. As expected it put a hash in the cute case but protected her phone! Due to the gash the case continued to peel and become difficult to use and unattractive. Torras glady replaced her case even though we had already thrown the damaged one away! Thank you Torras for standing by your product!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but not the mint color we expected...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Fits iPhone 6 very well. Has a nice feel and seems very durable. My only complaint is the color mint does not represent the color of the case We received at all. It’s more of a muted blue/grey color. We’re keeping because it’s a nice case and too much trouble to return and wait for a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: **update 6/6/18, seller offered either a free case or a refund. I went with the free case, because I really do enjoy the cases.** This is my second time ordering this case, because I really do like it. My phone feels protected and I like the color of it. But, within a month of getting it the first time the silicone around the bottom corners cracked and peeled away. If the second one wears down as quickly I won’t order a third time.
customer_reviews.author: mary h

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case earlier this year because my previous phone case which has lasted me since 2015 was breaking down. My intention was to buy something relatively cheap that will just get the job done until the next line of iPhone become available this September 2019. And for that it worked relatively well. I have been using this case for a few months now and it is already showing some wear and tear. One of the corners near the bottom speaker has already begun to chip away. If you're looking for a cheap, but decent phone case just to last for a few months this case will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: A very good case.
customer_reviews.text: This case is somewhat more slippery than a genuine apple case. It's silicone compound seems harder than the now 2-yr old Apple case I have, but quite possibly it's due to the fact that it's new and with time and use it will become more tactile. Overall build quality is very good, the case fits snugly and provides grip enough to prevent the accidental drop, which is what I was looking for. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case. Great Customer Service when product failed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case because I liked the look and price. I was very pleased when it arrived and it worked well. A couple weeks later, it had already cracked by the bottom corner. Torras customer service reached out to me directly (unsolicited) to ask me about my recent purchase. When I explained my issue and disappointment, they were MORE than helpful and immediately shipped out a new case directly to me. It arrived in a few days and replaced the broken case. I am very impressed with the direct customer service and follow up by Torras. If anyone has any issues, I suggest you contact them and the seem to want to make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marano

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black case a while ago and I really have liked the overall comfort and simplicity of this case. Up until last week, the bottom edges of this case started tearing off exposing its hard case frame. When i received this case, i remember it saying it was backed by an extra long warranty, however, i can't seem to find any warranty information for the case anywhere and threw out its original packaging. I really enjoyed this simple case, so disappointed it's losing it's rubber silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: This product is a temporary phone case and in my experience should not be used for a long time. I bought it after thinking it was a reasonably priced phone case, however after a few months the bottom corners started to peel off. As time went on, the case continued to deteriorate. I often had trouble pulling it out of coat or pant pockets because the cracks (that led to the peeling off) would snag on the inside of the jacket. When the area next to the home button began to crack, I realized that this product is not a long term product. I liked the color, but not the disheveled case.
customer_reviews.author: lattegirl

customer_reviews.title: No so great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this for only a couple months and asked for a new case for Christmas because it was peeling. I was surprised because she spend 20$ of her own money so I thought it was hold up relatively decent. She is in middle school but is a fashionista and takes care of her belongings. She was real bummed because she said the texture was perfect and for once it wasn’t the type of case to change color when she put in her pocket like many other cases have.
customer_reviews.author: nicole boutell

customer_reviews.title: No phone protection!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for protection! My daughter has had an iPhone for about 3 years and I’ve always made her use an Otterbox case. She talked me into this case about 2 weeks ago, today she dropped her phone and the screen it completely broken. This product is pretty and slim but does not offer protection!
customer_reviews.author: Ta

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!!!!!!! Update: Corners breaking :(
customer_reviews.text: Recieved yesterday, it has a great, slim fit. Its slim yet has the frontal lip to protect from the screen touching surfaces. My pop-socket does not stick to the sillicone surface very well, but the case is so soft to the touch and STAYS on the phone without slipping. I don’t know about longevity yet, will update later to produce an accurate review. Update: It has been about three months and I've handled it very gently yet the bottom two corners have cracked in half. Disappointed by this. Other than that I still use it and love it very dearly.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Pasche

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in your hands and slide in pocket
customer_reviews.text: This cover has a great feel when you hold it. It doesn't slip from my hand as others do. It also slides in my pants pocket without problem which is a surprise cause it feels non slippery. It is flexible yet sturdy enough to the the job. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Self Destructs in just 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we bought one of these for my daughter because she likes the look of it. We assumed the first one fell apart due to bad luck, but here's a photo of what's happened to the second one in just 3 months. My daughter is pretty gentle with the things that she owns. Maybe we just got SUPER unlucky, but the evidence shows this case is just made from super flimsy material.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I like this, but the material is a bit sticky
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but the material is a bit sticky. It doesn't slide in and out of your pocket very easily and will pick up lint. It is a nice color though and seems to protect my phone well (I drop it all the time). I don't know if I'd purchase this again because the material is weird, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Not so durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, soft to the touch but not slippery. However, after just over a month of use the case is starting to show signs of wear and tear, literally. I’m not tough on my gadgets so I’ve never had this issue but the cutout around the ring switch ripped and the material at the bottom front cutouts is chipping off. I’ve never ordered a case over $10 so I expected more from this one but am kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Okusdokus

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my iPhone 6 almost a year ago and I really liked the fact that I can clean it . However one of the corners cracked when the phone was not dropped and the rubber started to peel in 3 different places so I trashed it today . Feeling disappointed! Update: After this review, I was contacted by TORRAS this morning asking for pictures of my blue case. They have offered to replace it At no cost to me. Their costumer service deserves 4 stars for being prompt and helpful I really do appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm on my FOURTH one of these cases. Pros: LOVE the way they feel, super low profile, very "grippy" Cons: pretty expensive considering they unfortunately do not last--the silicone will start to tear in about 4-5 months. I still can't find a case I like this much so I'll probably be stupid and buy another.....
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Cracked with minimal use - replacement sent
customer_reviews.text: A crack has developed within a couple of months of having this case on without any excessive wear on the product. Otherwise, the product looks nice and has a nice texture. ***Update - Seller communicated efficiently and sent a replacement unit. It has been on my wife's phone now for a couple weeks now and seems to holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Weatherson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite fit iPhone 6S
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 6S slid into the case with only the usual amount of difficulty, but once it was in place I could see that the bottom corners of the case were stretched out of shape by the corners of the phone. I double checked that the phone was pushed all the way into the top of the case, and that was as far as it would go. Took it on and off a few times to make sure. This case does not quite fit the phone it was designed for, so it's getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: RandomS

customer_reviews.title: Love this iphone case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this iphone case! This is my second time buying it. I had the first one for a couple years and just got a new phone so I thought id get a new case too! Super soft material. The magnet built into the back is really convenient. I have a small magnetic iphone stand in my car and can easily stick my phone to it when using gps.
customer_reviews.author: TheCharmingMuse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: I used this case for a very long time. Fits great and feels very high quality. Their customer service is top-notch and usually their cases come with a warranty. Contacting them is easy and they reply very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Toop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This case looks great in red. The built-in ability to use a vent holder is nice, as you only receive a couple of pieces when you purchase those separately. I requested a replacement after the normal warranty period as it had torn at the ringer mute switch. Not only did TORRAS replace it, but they asked my choice of color! I stayed with red. They are the only covers I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RBFG

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with the color and how soft the case is and easy to hold. On the other hand the bottom corners are completely destroyed and is ripped in a few other places. Also I dropped my phone with this case on it and my phone shattered *update seller sent me a new case for free that is way better and doesn’t peel
customer_reviews.author: Ag

customer_reviews.title: Great service and follow ups
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Feb for iPhone 6s and it has been 4 months. I have been very careful in making sure that i don't drop the phone or wet stain it.. However the skin is peeling off from multiple places and i already see 2 cracks. My last one lasted me a year plus so it did not turn out to be good quality. Updated Review: Torras team was very helpful in replacing the silicon cover. The new cover is working great and i have so far not seen any damage or peeling. Thanks again for follow up and prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Anuj Dham

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone case
customer_reviews.text: I have used this phone case since I ordered it a few months ago and I really like it. It is a great color and easy to slip on. I've noticed at least 3 tears in it already which may be because I am hard on my phones but I think it is also not the most durable.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen SanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel to the case. Won’t last more than a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel to the case. But lasted a week before it ripped. Don’t buy waste of money Update Torras has reached out and sent a replacement case free of charge. I will update again if the case starts to deteriorate. **Second update** Case started to ripe again for the second time in the same place. Although I love the look and feel of the case the quality just is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case July 11th and after a couple days usage it already chipped at the corner. I take good care of my stuff and this case should be lasting longer then 2 month!! I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE ROWAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After I posted about my issues, I was contacted and they sent me a new phone case immediately. Amazing customer service! I really love this case - the color is great, it doesn’t slip out of your hand and it protects the phone - but about two months ago the corners started peeling up like others have reviewed. Sad as I had recommended this to others who had complimented me on it and I do love it otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Levitan

customer_reviews.title: great until it starts peeling
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple, slim look of this case and it works well to protect my phone, but after about 6 months, the outer layer started to peel off. Now (about 10 months after purchase) the bottom corners are badly frayed.
customer_reviews.author: lewhoo

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Slim sleek and easy to hold. Fits nicely in your pocket. Case is soft and stylish. Great quality! Came back and ordered another one. Colors are great. I got light blue and black.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Valdes

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The color is beautiful and it is really soft. The texture does make it a little difficult to slide into and out of tight pants pockets though. The rubber also started peeling off not long after I got it. It's pretty much isolated to the corners and I still use it though.
customer_reviews.author: kait

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: This case is slim and is so smooth. It is easy to hold and has protected my phone through many drops. With that being said, the silicon does peel easily. I am giving this case five stars because when my case got messed up and ripped, I contacted customer service. They were so helpful and friendly and are sending me a new one, free of charge. They even asked if I wanted a different color or style! I highly appreciate how helpful they have been and how quickly they responded to my email.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart, poor phone protection
customer_reviews.text: The material starts to flake apart after a number of months. Corners of phone are only minimally protected. It does look and feel great. Does the product have long term value? Review after 12 months of purchase..
customer_reviews.author: LukeeB

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year, then starting to peel off
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's been a decent case. I like it's slim profile, easy to put in a pocket. Getting it back out is another story-it does stick pretty well, especially the corners. The case has a very thin skin that doesn't hold up. Good temporary case, if you like to upgrade your phone every year.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conover

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone !
customer_reviews.text: ive dropped my phone here and there over the past two years and my phone was always fine. My phone recently slipped out of my coat pocket and fell face down in the street and got ran over by a car almost immediately. I did also have a screen film protector but I think this case totally saved my phone from being crushed. It works fine and it’s like it never happened. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, finish, and price
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my mom. Now her phone looks brand new again. Great fit and finish. Not too slick and not too tacky, this case was perfect for her preference. All buttons, speakers, and functionality were accessible. Color (dark blue) was exactly as advertised and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chinorican

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as i had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Developed a number of tears and holes in the case within just a few months. Also, though the material is great to prevent you from dropping, it does make it difficult to get it out of your pocket. The inside of the pocket generally comes out when i try to get the phone out. Case looks great and feels great but with rips and inability to get it out of your pocket without everything else coming with it, not recommended... Update: Seller offered to send me replacement. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great case with a small problem
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the feel of this case! I did have a problem when I went to mute sound on my phone however. My case ripped. It didn’t affect how it works, but I was just a little annoyed to have it rip on the very first day I received it. Otherwise I am very pleased with my purchase. And yes, I would purchase this same case again.
customer_reviews.author: K. VanKeuren

customer_reviews.title: Case feels like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: After Torras read my review they contacted me saying they wanted to fix any problems I had to make me happy. Now, that's good customer service! Within a couple of days I received a new case. Hopefully this one lasts longer than the first. Case feels like good quality. Love how there is a built in magnet for a car mount. The pink is very nice. However I've only used it for one day and the rubber is already peeling from the plastic on the case.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality, deteriorates and cracks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Loved this case when i first got it, but the corners quickly deteriorated. The rubber tore up, the plastic underneath cracking, and the felt ripping up. It seems the product is not built to fit my 6s. When I posted a review before stating these issues, I was asked to take down my review by customer service for a replacement under warranty. I accepted the warranty, thinking maybe I just had a faulty case. Within two weeks my new case looked just like my old one, broken. I love the feel of the case, but the build quality is very poor. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S from Purdue

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and nice texture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my girlfriend and she loved it! Her favorite part about this case is the texture and feeling on the outside and inside of the case! Its actually very durable and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the yellow case. It is more of a soft yellow, not a bright primary yellow. It's slim, feels wonderful in my hand and was easy to put on. The metal plate is embedded between the case and the soft fabric which protects the back of the phone. It mounts easily on my magnetic car mount. I love it and recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: KPW

product_meta.title: TORRAS [Love Series iPhone 6S Case/iPhone 6 Case, Liquid Silicone Rubber Shockproof Case with Soft Microfiber Cloth Cushion Compatible with iPhone 6 / 6S, Light Blue
feature_bullets: Designed for Apple iPhone 6s (2015 Model) and iPhone 6 (2014 Model) 4.7 inches
Material: made with liquid silicone rubber, Provide smooth skin texture, scratch-resistant performance
The inner material made with microfiber cushion, gentle and exquisite, born for protect your iPhone 6 and 6s
This case built-in metal plate, it will be convinient for you to put your phone on magnetic suction holder when driving
1-year quality warranty, If has quality problems within 1 year, we would send you a replacement without returning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars5,753 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
